snippet: Russia’s protest movement appears to have entered a new and unpredictable stage, and Sergei Udaltsov, one of its most prominent leaders, is at the center of a debate about its future.
abstract: Saturday Profile of Sergei Udaltsov, Russian political activist whose visible role in nation's protest movement has raised concerns among some liberal opposition leaders that he and his followers could take control, leading to a darker future.

byline.contributor: Ellen Barry and Andrew Roth contributed reporting.

lead_paragraph: Russia’s protest movement appears to have entered a new and unpredictable stage, and Sergei Udaltsov, one of its most prominent leaders, is at the center of a debate about its future.

headline.seo: Sergei Udaltsov, Russian Protest Leader, Takes Center Stage
headline.main: A Russian Protest Leader Takes Center Stage
headline.print_headline: A Russian Protest Leader Takes Center Stage
